samplesource.exit: Thank you for taking our survey.
Thank you for taking our survey. Your efforts are greatly appreciated!

Thanks for your interest and taking the time to answer these questions. Based on your responses, this community may not be the best fit for you, but we’ll be sure to let you know if there are other opportunities for you to participate in the future. Thanks again, we will really appreciate the time you’ve taken.

radio.label: q1
radio.title:
Thank you for your interest in this important market research study. First, do you agree to keep the contents of the study strictly confidential, and further agree that for any personal data about you or your device which is collected as part of the study, we may (i) use it ourselves in connection with the study, (ii) share it with third parties, who may use it solely in assisting us with the study, or (iii) share it with our client, who may use it in connection with its business? If you have any further questions, we can send you our 
Terms of Use & Privacy Policy for more details.

survey.html: Thanks for your interest and for taking the time to answer these questions. We’re sorry that you have decided not to join the community. We’ll be sure to let you know if there are other opportunities for you to participate in the future.

radio.label: q24
radio.title: Thinking about your lifestyle, how much do you agree or disagree with the following statements?
radio.row: People often come to me for advice about products and brands
I feel like people often copy what I do or wear
I often post pictures and/or videos on social media
I am well informed about food trends
I participate in a workout program at least 3x per week
I use mobile apps to track fitness and or nutrition
I prioritize fast-food/quick service restaurants with healthy options
I like to live an active lifestyle
The food brands I support make good food and do good in the world
My purchase decisions can make a larger societal impact
I care about making sure the future is a better place than today
I seek out information on what goes into the food I eat and where it comes from

radio.title: Which of the following statements BEST describe you?

I’m curious to hear/learn about what others have to say
I enjoy sharing my opinions online
I spend 1-3 hours on the internet each week
I spend 4+ hours on the internet each week
I spend less than an hour on the internet each week
I often participate in other online forums (communities, blogs, chat rooms)
The best part about online forums is earning rewards

text.label: q32
text.title:
Fantastic!  We’re pleased to tell you that you’ve been accepted into the  Guac Stars Community.  A couple of ground rules—by providing your email address and clicking “NEXT” below to join the Community, you agree that:
Any ideas, concepts, feedback, or other content you supply within the Community belong exclusively to us or the Community’s sponsor, and we may use them for any purpose without the need to pay you any additional compensation; and
We and the Community’s sponsor own all rights to any photos or videos (including any which include your face or voice) which you upload to the Community platform, and may use the photos or videos in any manner and on any media anywhere in the world, including in connection with the Community or otherwise, without the need to pay you any additional compensation.
Your email address must be in the following format blank @ blank.com,    blank @ blank.org, blank @ blank.net or blank @ blank.edu
text.comment: Please enter your email address below

text.label: q33
text.validate:
import re count1 = len(re.findall(r'\d', q33.val[0])) if(count1 gt 0): error("Your username has either a number, space or special character, please consider another username.")
count2 = len(re.findall(r'\w', q33.val)) if count2 lt len(q33.val): error("Your username has either a number, space or special character, please consider another username.")

text.label: q34

em.span: Enter your response in the box.

text.validate:
if q32.val != q34.val:
error("Please make sure your emails match.")
